title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When attempting to use the 'Close all saved' feature, sometimes the file remains open despite no changes being made.
EB: It is expected that the 'Close all saved' feature should close the file when no changes have been made.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open multiple files in the software.
2. Make sure that at least one of the files has been saved and no changes have been made.
3. Use the 'Close all saved' feature to close all the files.
4. Observe if the file that has no changes remains open.
